revised_title: Sequence Similarities between the Gene Specifying 1-Phosphofructokinase and Other Kinases in Escherichia Coli K12 and lacC of Staphylococcus Aureus
tldr: The authors determined the sequence of the fruK gene of Escherichia coli K12 and found significant sequence similarities with the minor 6-phosphofructokinase gene (pfkB) of E. coli, the lacC gene product of Staphylococcus aureus, and the ribokinase gene of E. coli. These findings suggest a possible role for the lacC gene product in similar metabolic pathways.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
